name: Elevator Brawl (Summer Frost Studios)
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Requires four controllers to play or you won't be able to launch into the game from the main menu.

Battle it out with three friends and the quirks of the elevator system to secure an item of fat cat's choosing and work your way up the corporate ladder.  Play as a lap dog, night owl, cash cow, kiss ass or.... Roger the human.

2 week Prototype created in Unreal Engine 4
